thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: N. L
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by N. L

author: N. L
title: N. L
text: My one peeve is that SO MANY of the styles are sold out! If ES is turning over inventory so quickly. (A good problem to have), they should figure out a way to keep popular items in stock. It's extremely frustrating to have to wait weeks or months for a wig you really want to come in stock. And I live in Canada so even more irritating. On the plus side, excellent service, fast shipping, reasonable pricing, great selection.
